org.svvrl.goal.core.repo.store

Class BuchiStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.repo.store.BuchiStore

  • public class BuchiStore
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods for interacting with Büchi Store.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
